mapper.sql: id as id, expert_id as expertId, service_type_id as serviceTypeId, create_date as createDate
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_expert_service_relation
expert_id = #{expertId},
service_type_id = #{serviceTypeId},
create_date = #{createDate},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_expert_service_relation
expert_id = #{map.expertId},
service_type_id = #{map.serviceTypeId},
create_date = #{map.createDate},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_expert_service_relation
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND expert_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.expertId} , '%')
AND service_type_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.serviceTypeId} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
